name: PRG155 Source Code
tagline: C source code from class labs and projects
body:
# Welcome. 

This site will allow you to browse the code I have personally typed in class.

###Usage Rights
I will allow everything posted to be used for personal reference, but not for anyone to hand in to a professor as their own work. 

###Redistributable
All content on here is free to be publicly viewed and shared as long as it is kept in original condition.

###No derivatives
No content is to be modified and redistributed as such. Any redistributions after modification of the source code is strictly prohibited.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
